address.title:
DATA (20 Bytes) - Address from which log originated
e.g 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

topics.title:
Array of DATA (32 Bytes) - Array of 0 to 4 indexed log arguments
e.g. 0xddf252ad1be2c89b69c2b068fc378daa952ba7f163c4a11628f55a4df523b3ef

data.title: DATA - Non-indexed arguments of the log

block_number.title: QUANTITY - Block number where this transaction was in

tx_hash.title:
DATA (32 Bytes) - Hash of the transaction.
e.g. 0x3b198bfd5d2907285af009e9ae84a0ecd63677110d89d7e030251acb87f6487e

tx_index.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the transactions index position in the block.

block_hash.title:
DATA (32 Bytes) - Hash of the block where this transaction was in.
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

index.title: QUANTITY - Integer of the log index position in the block

removed.description: Removed field is true if this log was reverted due to a chain reorganisation.

tx_hash.title:
HASH (32 Bytes) - Hash of the transaction.
e.g 0x3b198bfd5d2907285af009e9ae84a0ecd63677110d89d7e030251acb87f6487e

block_hash.title:
HASH (32 Bytes) - Hash of the block where this transaction was in.
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

block_number.description: QUANTITY - Block number where this transaction was in.

tx_index.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the transactions index position in the block.

contract_address.title:
DATA (20 Bytes) - The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation
e.g 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

post_state.title:
DATA (32 Bytes) - State root hash after executing transaction
e.g. 0x656c34545f90a730a19008c0e7a7cd4fb3895064b48d6d69761bd5abad681056

status.description: QUANTITY - 0 indicates transaction failure , 1 indicates transaction success.

bloom.description: DATA (256 Bytes) - Bloom filter of logs/events generated by contracts during transaction execution.

logs.description: Array - Array of log objects, which this transaction generated.

gas_used.description: QUANTITY - The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone.

cumulative_gas_used.description: QUANTITY - The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block.

to.title:
DATA (20 Bytes) - The address of the receiver. null when itâ€™s a contract creation transaction.
e.g. 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

value.title:
QUANTITY - Integer of the value sent with this transaction.
e.g 0xaf23

gas.description: QUANTITY - Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution.

gas_price.title:
QUANTITY - Integer of the gas price used for each paid gas.
e.g 0xaf23b

data.title:
DATA - Hash of the method signature (4 bytes) followed by encoded parameters.
e.g 0xa9059cbb000000000000000000000000ff778b716fc07d98839f48ddb88d8be583beb684000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002386f26fc10000

raw.title: DATA - The signed, RLP encoded transaction

tx_hash.title:
DATA (32 Bytes) - Hash of the transaction.
e.g. 0x0a0cafa26ca3f411e6629e9e02c53f23713b0033d7a72e534136104b5447a210

txMethod.title:
- ETH_SENDRAWTRANSACTION: Classic Ethereum Transaction
 - ETH_SENDPRIVATETRANSACTION: Quorum Constellation
 - ETH_SENDRAWPRIVATETRANSACTION: Quorum Tessera
 - EEA_SENDPRIVATETRANSACTION: Besu Orion

from.title:
Sender of the transaction - Ethereum Account Address
e.g 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

to.title:
The address of the receiver. null when itâ€™s a contract creation transaction.
e.g. 0xAf84242d70aE9D268E2bE3616ED497BA28A7b62C

gas.description: Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution.

gas_price.title:
Integer of the gas price used for each paid gas.
e.g 0xaf23b

value.title:
Integer of the value sent with this transaction.
e.g 0xaf23

data.title:
Hash of the method signature (4 bytes) followed by encoded parameters.
e.g 0xa9059cbb000000000000000000000000ff778b716fc07d98839f48ddb88d8be583beb684000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002386f26fc10000

method_signature.title:
Signature of the method to call on contract
e.g "transfer(address,uint256)"

args.title: Arguments to feed on transaction call

chain.title:
Name of the Chain as registered on the chain registry
e.g. 1 for mainnet, 3 for Ropsten

method.title: Type of a protocol that should be used

id.title:
ID of the Request in UUID RFC 4122, ISO/IEC 9834-8:2005 format
e.g a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11

ID of the Response in UUID RFC 4122, ISO/IEC 9834-8:2005 format
e.g a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11

ApiKeyAuth.description: Add the value of your API-Key
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
